name: Sit Down (Zbyszek Kielbasa)
description:
Arena shooter where you have to buy and upgrade weapons to get to higher waves.

*There is saving in them (just don't use alt + f4)

There supposed to be more in it, but project got corrupted and said bye-bye, so I thought I will just post it the way it is. Still, feedback is welcomed, because I will be doing in the future another top-down shooter.
